actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exclude from gross income, for purposes of Federal income tax, interest paid to sellers of agricultural land purchased with loans made by such sellers to certain farmers and ranchers and insured under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from the gross income of a seller interest received on loans insured under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act which are used for the purchase of agricultural land by certain farmers or ranchers.

titles.title: A bill to exclude from gross income, for purposes of Federal income tax, interest paid to sellers of agricultural land purchased with loans made by such sellers to certain farmers and ranchers and insured under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act.
